message.subject: Enron Compressor Services
message.content:
M1.1. I sold 3,253 dth per day of Florida Zone 3 gas at $3.60 to Bob Crites (713-420-2499) at El Paso effective 4/3/02 - 4/30/02.
[Inform: amount per day, type, price, recipient, location, and dates of gas sold]
M1.2. I'm leaving this deal out of Sitara because its an Enron Compressor Services deal, not ENA.
[Inform: Chris is leaving this deal out of Sitara because of deal type]
M1.3. Kay,
[Conventional: salutation]
M1.4. I need to send a GISB agreement as Enron Compressor Services to El Paso.
[Inform: Chris needs Kay to send a GISB agreement to El Paso]
M1.5. Would you work on that? [Y]
[Request-Information: would Kay work on this]
Flink1.5
M1.6. Mark,
[Conventional: salutation]
M1.7. I'm not sure who at Enron to notify about this deal.
[Inform: Chris is not sure who to notify at Enron about deal]
M1.8. You and I can chat about that later.
[Inform: Chris would like to discuss this with Mark later]
M1.9. I only asked for 2 bids for the April gas.
[Inform: Chris asked for 2 bids for April gas]
M1.10. Reliant showed me a bid of $3.58 and El Paso shoed me a bid of $3.60.
[Inform: Reliant Energy and El Paso bids]

message.subject: Enron Compressor Services
message.content:
M2.1. Mark,
[Conventional: salutation]
M2.2. per your request I've copied Jim Coffey and Troy Denetsosie.
[Inform: Chris copied Jim and Troy]
M2.3. I will work with legal and El Paso to set up a GISB agreement.
[Inform: Chris will work with legal and El Paso to set up GISB agreement]

message.subject: Enron Compressor Services
message.content:
M3.1. Do I need to do something about this?
[Request-Information: does Sabra need to do something about gas deal]
Flink3.1
M3.2. Who is nominating this or where did you get the gas, is it a buy/sell?
[Request-Information: nominator, where gas came from, whether buy/sell]
Flink3.2
M3.3. Just curious...I was out yesterday.
[Inform: Sabra was out yesterday and is curious]
